price: "Kuma inã nĩsantar ku da abin da kuke kira, baicin Allah kuma inã kiran Ubangijina, tsammãnin kada in zama marashin arziki game da kiran Ubangijina."
arabic: وَأَعۡتَزِلُكُمۡ وَمَا تَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَدۡعُواْ رَبِّي عَسَىٰٓ أَلَّآ أَكُونَ بِدُعَآءِ رَبِّي شَقِيّٗا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-aʿtazilukum wamā tadʿūna min dūni al-lahi wa-adʿū rabbī ʿasā allā akūna biduʿāi rabbī shaqiyyan
